info.description: Documented API for the interim document management solution.To use the API calls generate an Authorization JWT Tokens (user and service) which is required in the header.

parameters.description: Service Auth (S2S). Use it when accessing the API on App Tier level.

parameters.description: User-id of the currently authenticated user. If provided will be used to populate the creator field of a document and will be used for authorisation.

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of roles of the currently authenticated user. If provided will be used for authorisation.
